data.title: Friends of Convocations
data.meta_description: Friends of Convocations support world-class performing arts at Purdue. Donors fill the financial gap & get benefits such as priority seating.
data.text:
FRIENDS OF CONVOCATIONS ENDOWMENT

Established with accumulated gifts from 1995-96 to provide support for the costs of presenting performances

2023-24 Support: West Lafayette Global Fest, Grandmaster Flash, Humans 2.0 by Circa, Las Cafeteras present Hasta La Muerte, Call of the Wild, Melissa White and Pallavi Mahidhara

JEANNE COMPTON ENDOWMENT FOR ARTISTIC EXCELLENCE

Established by Jeanne and Dale Compton to provide performance support and ensure performance variety

2023-24 Support: Kronos Quartet

ROBERT B. AND PATRICIA PEYTON TRUITT PIANO PERFORMANCE ENDOWMENT

Established by Bob and Patti Truitt to provide performance support, with emphasis on piano-based solo or small ensemble classical and jazz music

2023-24 Support: Counterpoint

DAVIS FAMILY ENDOWMENT

Established by Kevin and Janene Davis to provide performance support

2023-24 Support: Briscoe

MIKE AND PAM LUENZ CLASSICAL MUSIC ENDOWMENT

Established by Mike and Pam Luenz to provide support for classical music, with emphasis on Discovery Artists

2023-24 Support: Melissa White and Pallavi Mahidhara

LEONORA AND HAROLD WOODMAN ENDOWMENT FOR THEATRE

Established by Harold Woodman to provide support for theatre projects

2023-24 Support: A Midsummer Night’s Dream

ALAN AND GAIL BECK ENDOWMENT

Established by Alan and Gail Beck to provide support for jazz and vocal music and innovative performances

MARY SEYFRIED’S ALL ABOARD FOR THE ARTS ENDOWMENT

Established by Mary Seyfried to provide tickets and bus transportation for students from schools with high economic need

2022-23 Support: The Secret Agency

MARY SEYFRIED’S COMMUNITY ACCESS TO THE ARTS ENDOWMENT

Established by Mary Seyfried to provide complimentary tickets to underserved populations

MARY SEYFRIED’S ENDOWMENT FOR ARTS OUTREACH AND ENGAGEMENT

Established by Mary Seyfried to provide support for in-school artist residencies and workshops

CHRISTIANE E. KECK AND DAVID L. FILMER ENDOWMENT

Established by Christiane Keck and David Filmer to underwrite discounted tickets for Purdue students

BILL EDWARD WILBURN ENDOWMENT

Established by Janet G. Wilburn to provide support for in-school artist residencies and workshops

FLOYD H. AND PATRICIA S. GARROTT ENDOWMENT FOR CURRICULAR CONNECTIONS

Established by Floyd and Patricia Garrott to provide discounted tickets to Purdue students whose faculty member has tied a performance to a course syllabus, support education research initiatives, and support P-12 matinee performances
